about_the_game:
September Fall - Cursed is a psychological horror game.

Story
The story revolves around a group of four close friends from high school, where youthful impulsiveness sometimes leads to reckless decisions. One day, they devised a daring prank, intending to give their teacher a scare. What was supposed to be harmless fun turned into a tragic accident due to their lack of foresight and rash actions. Nine years later, when the memory of that event has mostly faded, they find themselves confronted with it once again.

Gameplay
You play as Jack, one of four close friends, experiencing his memories from 9 years ago while navigating the present alongside Harry to confront the mistake of the past.
The game features a first-person perspective with walking simulation, dialogue, object interaction, and dark elements.
Game has Multiple Endings.

name: September Fall - Cursed

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 8600
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GTX 1060 6GB
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 6 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-10600k
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia RTX 2070
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 6 GB available space

short_description: A psychological horror game where you and three childhood friends must confront events that happened nine years ago.
supported_languages:
English*, Vietnamese, Japanese, Korean, Russian, Simplified Chinese
*languages with full audio support
